name: Pixel Zombies
description:
Try to stay alive for as long as possible while managing screen space, ammunition, armor durability, and your life while fending off 8-bit zombies.

Space to start

A/left arrow to go left, D/right arrow to go right,

W/up arrow to jump, S/down arrow to dash.

E to shoot, Q to melee, V to activate armor.

CHeat mode turns off the ability to beat the high score, you have to restart the game with the green flag to turn off the cheat mode.
